description: Digital-output capacitive relative humidity and temperature sensor/module with 4-pin package and long transmission distance.

specifications.dimensions: Small: 14 mm × 18 mm × 5.5 mm; Big: 22 mm × 28 mm × 5 mm
other: Long transmission distance up to 20 m

getting_started.connection_guide: Connect VCC to 3.3‑6 V, GND to ground, and Data to a digital I/O pin. Place a 100 nF capacitor between VCC and GND for filtering. Use a pull‑up resistor (4.7 kΩ) on the data line if required.

example_code.explaination: Arduino sketch using the DHT library to read humidity and temperature from the DHT22 every 2 seconds.

source_document: Aosong Electronics Co.,Ltd technical specification document for DHT22 (AM2302) sensor.
